title: 215: MATT JAMES’ BACHELOR PREMIERE (Matt Stans & Cast Stans - Minus a Few…)
itunes:title: 215: MATT JAMES’ BACHELOR PREMIERE (Matt Stans & Cast Stans - Minus a Few…)
description:
It is Matt James first episode as The Bachelor and Bekah and Jess think they have fallen in love - with him and most of the cast! The Broads discuss Matt being ABC’s first Black bachelor (FINALLY) and the introduction to a cast of incredible women…and a queen, apparently. This is going to be an amazing, wild ride of a season - they can feel it.
